item.description:
IBD Method Group

Please RSVP!

Preparation:Please bring to the meeting a copy of the Word document Review of the Level One Material. It can be found in our meetup.com Files area here. Also, if you can please print out another copy of the document for others who do not RSVP, that would be welcome.

This month's agenda:
  • IBD Method Topic (or Website) Chris - We go over a basic aspect of the IBD Method.
  • IBD Market report - Keith
  • Mike's Method - Mike shares his original research and starts a group watchlist
  • In-depth stock - Chris
  • Tips and Techniques - Jeff



Who We Are

This IBD Method is for people who are currently learning and applying IBD tools and the CANSLIM Method to their investing.

Only those seeking to learn the IBD CANSLIM Method should attend.




  • We have our own Google Group - IBDLevels. This is a moderated discussion that is also an IBD centric Google Group and its home page says as much. Join it via this link: http://groups.google....

group.name: Boston Investor's Business Daily Meetup Group

item.name: IBD Method Group
